Text: Is this one working for anybody?

If you are having ANY problems getting it working, please let me know. This is a repatch of the versions that are already on TPB. The other Roms would load past the Customization screen but freeze hours into the game during cutscenes. I have now played the game completely through on this patch with no problems running an Acekard2i and Akaio 1.7 with the loader updated.
If the rom works for you, please state it in the comments section and what card you are working with.
Was able to create a character and a quick save. So works better then other copies. Using no$gba 2.6a.

Crashes during the first major cinematic, less than an hour in. Using R4 with 1.18 kernel (appears to be the latest). Recopied kernel and tried again, froze at exact same spot. (Kid looking at the sky.)
Disable Auto patching and soft reset functions under options for that rom and try it again.
All my files got deleted.  I'm not sure but I think this is the cause.
